title: Old Maid - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Horror   School Life   Shounen   Tragedy
tags: Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Orphans
author: Tokitou Kaname   時任要
description: 20XX. Japan has become a super-aging society with half its population going over the age of 65. To put an end to the blockage of the society, a law has been worked out: “The Unmanaged Elderly Migration Law” or “Ubasute (abandoning old woman) Law” for short. Making every effort to save his grandmother from the evil law, high-schooler Kurata Nobuhiko’s fate is…?>
